Music Awards.description: Recognizing outstanding achievements in the music industry.

Best Male Artist.description: Awarded to the best-performing male artist of the year.

Best Female Artist.description: Awarded to the best-performing female artist of the year.

Song of the Year.description: Awarded to the most popular and influential song of the year.

Film & TV Awards.description: Honoring excellence in film and television.

Best Actor.description: Awarded to the best-performing male actor in a leading role.

Best Actress.description: Awarded to the best-performing female actor in a leading role.

Comedy Awards.description: Celebrating achievements in comedy and entertainment.

Best Stand-up Comedian.description: Recognizing the best stand-up comedian of the year.

Best Comedy Film.description: Awarded to the best comedy film of the year.
